document.full_text: british pharmaceutical group btg said its oncogel treatment did not show any impact on tumors in patients with esophageal cancer and it would not seek a partner for the product.
document.title: btg's esophageal cancer gel fails in trial
lines_and_colors: british pharmaceutical group btg said its oncogel treatment did not show any impact on tumors in patients with esophageal cancer and it would not seek a partner for the product.
